channel.title: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!
channel.description:
[ul][list][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ke1bs2f.png[/img][/center] [center][i][b][size=18pt]The next 15 players to join from Moparscape will receive a free $10 member scroll.[/size][/b][/center] [center][i][b][size=18pt]Join Now![/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=24pt][b][url=http://www.asgardous.com/]Home[/url][/b][/size][/center] [center][size=24pt][b][url=http://www.asgardous.com/play/]Play[/url][/b][/size][/center] [center][size=24pt][b][url=http://www.asgardous.com/forum/]Forums[/url][/b][/size][/center]
[center][i][b]This is a brand new server, full release is minutes before this post.[/b][/i][/center]
[center][b][size=24pt]Features:[/size][/b][/center]
[center][i][b][size=14pt]See Media Below[/size][/b][/i][/center]
[list] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Flawless Player Killing/PvP[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Multiple GameModes[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Random Events (Evil Tree, Crashed Star, and random staff hosted events)[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Forum Contests with in-game prizes[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]All skills, including Summoning, Dungeoneering and Construction[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Pets, including Boss Pets[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Gambling and Staking[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Incredibly smooth PvM[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Auto Vote with Vote Store(offering Full Dragon (or), Chaotics, Coloured Whips and Barrows Sets)[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Auto Donate (with hierarchical member ranks)[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]PK Store (Perfect PKing, including store offering Claws, Korasi, GS's and Torva)[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Practically every boss and minigame[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Tons of dungeons[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Flawless Slayer, with Slayer Dungeons and Points Shop[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Player Profiles (accessible via ::players)[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]E-Mail Saving for Account Recovery[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Achievements and Quests (lots)[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]Prestige and Loyalty systems, with Prestige and Loyalty Points - Including Titles[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center] [center][list][li][size=12pt][i][b]And tons more. Check us out now.[/b][/i][/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/EU3BhMt.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QNLTNFz.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QEUwLnN.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/77aCzdn.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/LXxv6Wy.png[/img][/center] [/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!
item.dc:creator: @ekekek12 ekekek12
item.description:
@ekekek12 wrote:

It’s not my server lmao and yes that is basic, but you obviously havnt fixed them! you cant even fix the simplest N/A BUG, and why havnt you created any other game modes? This is 100% rip, you have just changed the style css on your website…

Try fixing some bugs before dissing another server.

P.s and tbh I believe he is actually working on a website at the moment.

Read full topic
item.source: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!

item.title: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!
item.dc:creator: @Asgardous Asgardous
item.description:
@Asgardous wrote:

flumby:

Ha, yeah ofc then why is everything still functioning the same?

Both your server and your website are unchanged ruse rips. Changing the home isn’t coding and sure as fuck doesn’t make it any less ruse. [quote=“ekekek12, post:12, topic:554117”][quote author=Angelxwx link=topic=673040.msg4500697#msg4500697 date=1450232302]
It’s fair and balanced.
Everything is fixed, everything works and it has a great economy.
Drops are not insanely hard, but not insanely easy. It’s at the perfect rate as well as exp.
Active players! -Angel.
[/quote]

Complete Ruse rip.

Nothing changed about it, same spawn location, same bugs. Ava doesn’t work, n/a playersonline bug. XP is stupid nex boss fight is glitchable same with the gmaul spec and staff of light spec.

IVe only seen a couple of decent Ruse based ones and that is Vagarious and NewRealm.

If I were you id go check themones.[/quote]

Nex is not glitchable, gmaul, SOL and Korasi glitches were fixed ages ago, basic shit bro. You clearly haven’t even logged in you’re just trying to give a shout out to NewRealm which is shit, laggy, no players and an unchanged website. Get a grip.

Read full topic
item.source: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!

item.title: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!

[quote=“Angelxwx, post:2, topic:554117”]It’s fair and balanced.
Everything is fixed, everything works and it has a great economy.
Drops are not insanely hard, but not insanely easy. It’s at the perfect rate as well as exp.
Active players! -Angel.[/quote]

Complete Ruse rip.

Nothing changed about it, same spawn location, same bugs. Ava doesn’t work, n/a playersonline bug. XP is stupid nex boss fight is glitchable same with the gmaul spec and staff of light spec.

IVe only seen a couple of decent Ruse based ones and that is Vagarious and NewRealm.

If I were you id go check themones.

item.source: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!

item.title: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!
item.dc:creator: @hxze hxze
item.description:
@hxze wrote:

flumby:

You have given no credits to Swiffy the owner of ruse as this has been untouched.

Is it really necessary to give credit to Swiffy for Ruse? Anyone who knows Ruse would know Swiffy made it. Besides, we have changed things, it’s not just another Ruse that’s been re-hosted and left untouched. The Owner (Thor) changed heaps of things code-wise, he just hasn’t added any new and unique content yet, which would make it more appealing.

I quote him on this:

“The only things that are still almost similar is the aesthetics, the actual view of the server, almost everything code wise is different. I’ve changed the entire variable system, I redid close to all class handlers, I personally rewrote the entire jar library.”

“I’ve fixed an uncountable amount of bugs at this point, I’ve never seen so many bugs on a server, I redid half the client, twice, I redid the cache and sprites, I wrote out a new update server, I’ve fixed tons of items and exploits.”

Read full topic
item.source: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!

item.title: Asgardous - A new era [Refunding Donators from other Servers] Daily Updates!
item.dc:creator: @hxze hxze
item.description:
@hxze wrote:

[ul][list][center][/center]
[center][i][size=18pt]The next 15 players to join from Moparscape will receive a free $10 member scroll.[/size][/center]
[center][i][size=18pt]Join Now![/size][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Home[/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Play[/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Forums[/size][/center]

[center]This is a brand new server, full release is minutes before this post.[/center]

[center][size=24pt]Features:[/size][/center]

[center][size=14pt]See Media Below[/size][/center]

[list]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Flawless Player Killing/PvP[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Multiple GameModes[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Random Events (Evil Tree, Crashed Star, and random staff hosted events)[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Forum Contests with in-game prizes[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]All skills, including Summoning, Dungeoneering and Construction[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Pets, including Boss Pets[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Gambling and Staking[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Incredibly smooth PvM[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Auto Vote with Vote Store(offering Full Dragon (or), Chaotics, Coloured Whips and Barrows Sets)[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Auto Donate (with hierarchical member ranks)[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]PK Store (Perfect PKing, including store offering Claws, Korasi, GS’s and Torva)[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Practically every boss and minigame[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Tons of dungeons[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Flawless Slayer, with Slayer Dungeons and Points Shop[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Player Profiles (accessible via ::players)[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]E-Mail Saving for Account Recovery[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Achievements and Quests (lots)[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]Prestige and Loyalty systems, with Prestige and Loyalty Points - Including Titles[/size][/li][/list][/center]
[center][list][li][size=12pt]And tons more. Check us out now.[/size][/li][/list][/center]

[/center]
